cs.IT, cs.CR, cs.DC, cs.DS, cs.SI. 

The paper deals with secure erasure coding schemes, which are typically studied in the information theory (cs.IT) and cryptography (cs.CR) communities. The paper also discusses distributed storage systems (cs.DS) and the properties of the coding schemes, which could fall under the category of distributed computing (cs.DC). Finally, the paper mentions security properties and adversaries, which could be relevant to the sub-category of security and privacy (cs.SI).
